title: Tales of Terror (Dracula, Frankenstein, The Legend of Sleepy Hol
description:
Tales of Terror (Dracula, Frankenstein, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow, The Phantom of the Opera, and 13 More Works of Vampires, Ghosts, and Classic Horror)What better way to become delightfully spooked than to read classic tales of ghosts, vampires, and hauntings? Here you will find familiar favorites like Dracula, Frankenstein, and the Headless Horseman, along with some chilling classics like "The Monkey's Paw" and Poe's "The Raven." 

Included in Tales of Terror are: 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The complete text of sixteen horror classics, each elegantly formatted for ease of use and enjoyment on your reader. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Links to free, full-length audio recordings of the novels and stories in this collection. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ An individual, active Table of Contents for each book.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Perfect formatting in rich text. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A low, can't-say-no price!

Additional Fan Resources 

Also included are special features for any horror enthusiast, including: 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A comprehensive list of the many film and television adaptations of the works included in this collection. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A Halloween Viewing Guide: a recommended viewing list of movies to get you in the mood for Halloween, including family favorites, classic movie monsters, and modern horror films. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The History of Halloween: a fascinating look into the origins of the holiday, the varieties of modern traditions, and a look into how Halloween is celebrated around the world.
